Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: வரைவிலா மாணிழையார் மென்றோள் புரையிலாப் பூரியர்கள் ஆழும் அளறு.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: The delicate shoulders of prostitutes with excellent jewels are a hell into which are plunged the ignorant base

Layered_Composition.Foreground: The beautiful, soft, bejeweled shoulders ('மாணிழையார் மென்றோள்') of a courtesan are shown. They appear inviting and luxurious.
Layered_Composition.Midground: However, these beautiful shoulders are revealed to be the deceptive, soft upper edge of a terrifying, deep, dark pit or hell ('அளறு').
Layered_Composition.Background: Ignorant, base men ('புரையிலாப் பூரியர்கள்'), attracted by the beauty of the shoulders, are shown blindly walking towards them and plunging into the abyss of ruin. It is a beautiful trap.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The soft shoulders of a bejeweled prostitute are a beautiful facade for the hell into which the ignorant and base will fall.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The shoulders as the beautiful, inviting rim of a hellish pit is the central, powerful metaphor. The men falling into this pit show the consequences.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Deceptive, a beautiful trap, ruinous, hellish.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The shoulders are lit with a soft, warm, seductive light. The pit below is an absolute, terrifying darkness, perhaps with a faint, hellish red glow from within.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A shot that starts as a beautiful, sensual close-up on the shoulders and then pulls back to reveal the terrifying pit they belong to.

Cultural_Anchors: The soft shoulders of the bejeweled courtesan
Into which the ignorant base will fall ('பூரியர்கள் ஆழும்').
